headline: How The Evergy (EVRG) Investment Story Is Shifting As Analyst Views Diverge
summary: Evergy’s updated fair value estimate has shifted to US$85.68 from US$84.05, while some external price targets have moved in different directions, including one raise to US$95 and a separate cut of US$2 from a major firm. That split mirrors the mixed research you are seeing, with bullish analysts lifting targets and maintaining positive ratings, and more cautious voices trimming expectations or downgrading. Read on to see how you can make sense of this evolving narrative and what it could mean...

headline: How The Investment Story For Publicis Groupe (ENXTPA:PUB) Is Shifting After Mixed Analyst Calls
summary: Publicis Groupe is back in focus after analysts trimmed their Fair Value estimate from €113.67 to €108.64, signalling a more cautious central view of what the shares may be worth. Behind that adjustment, recent Street commentary shows a split between bullish voices lifting targets to around €109 to €115 and more cautious houses cutting their targets by €5 to €10. As you read on, you will see how these differing calls shape the evolving story around Publicis and what to watch as the narrative...

headline: Why The Empire State Realty Trust (ESRT) Investment Story Is Being Rewritten Around Lower Targets
summary: Empire State Realty Trust is back in focus after a fresh round of research updates pulled fair value estimates lower, with one key model reducing its price target from US$8.36 to US$7.36. Several firms have clustered new targets between about US$6.80 and US$7, pairing that shift with largely unchanged ratings as they weigh solid operating commentary against tighter expectations on execution. As you read on, you will see how these price target moves fit into the evolving analyst narrative and...

headline: Why The Persimmon (LSE:PSN) Story Is Shifting As Fair Value And Analyst Views Diverge
summary: Persimmon’s refreshed fair value estimate has been nudged to £16.26, a small move that still matters if you are watching how targets cluster around the current share price. Recent Street commentary, including a 2 GBp target lift from Citi alongside a downgrade from Deutsche Bank, shows that views are split on how much risk is acceptable for the potential reward at this level. As you read on, you will see how these incremental target tweaks fit into the wider narrative and what to watch as...

headline: How The General Dynamics (GD) Story Is Shifting As Analysts Rework Targets And Risks
summary: General Dynamics is back in focus as analysts adjust their price targets, with several recent updates clustering in the high US$300s. Those moves are being driven less by big shifts in fair value inputs and more by changing views on sector momentum, policy risk, and the durability of cash generation. As you read on, you will see how this evolving narrative could shape your own view of General Dynamics over the coming quarters. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full story. Head...

headline: These 2 chip stocks are new Top Picks at Citi
summary: Investing.com -- Citi has moved Texas Instruments (NASDAQ:TXN) and Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ:MPWR) to its top Buy-rated analog semiconductor picks following the latest earnings season, saying the group has entered a more favorable phase of the cycle.

headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on AutoZone Stock?
summary: AutoZone has underperformed the broader market over the past year, but analysts are highly optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
